content:
From: Toby.Murray@data61.csiro.au
For anyone who encounters this or similar issues in the future:

I was able to resolve this by removing the lines

\RequirePackage{comment}
\excludecomment{CCSXML}

from acmsmall.cls

While I can't claim to understand what's going on here, I presume some
conflict between Isabelle's comment.sty and that expected by
acmsmall.cls, or something similar.

Apologies for the noise

Thanks

Toby
